/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, divided by a concrete median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees on both sides. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds visible in the distance. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the landscape.
